name: iccf

stmt.origin: ixxf(hs0, hs1, hs2, cicc, cle, cle)
stmt.pretty: ixxf(hs0, hs1, hs2, cicc, cle, cle)

body.origin:
|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| wceq(cicc, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxr, cxr, crab(hs2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, cv(hs1))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffsc(hs0, cle)
-| diffsc(hs0, cle)
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| wceq(cicc, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxr, cxr, crab(hs2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, cv(hs1))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffsc(hs0, cle)
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cicc, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxr, cxr, crab(hs2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, cv(hs1))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffsc(hs0, cle)
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffsc(hs0, cle)
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffsc(hs0, cle)
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| diffsc(hs0, cle)
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| diffsc(hs1, cle)
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

|- wf(cicc, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
-| diffsc(hs2, cle)

comment: The set of closed intervals of extended reals maps to subsets of extended reals. (Contributed by FL, 14-Jun-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
